title: Timetable changes for routes 772, 775 and 779
articleContent:
From Monday 7 June 2021, minor timetable changes will be made to improve passenger journeys and access to timely services for bus Route 772 Frankston – Eliza Heights, bus Route 775 Frankston – Lakewood via Heatherhill Road and bus Route 779 Frankston to Belvedere via Kananook.

  • Route 772 Frankston – Eliza Heights: two weekday morning services will depart 10 minutes earlier from Frankston Station and Frankston South. The new timetable will improve bus services for students living in the south and north of Frankston to travel to Frankston High School.
  • Route 775 Frankston – Lakewood via Heatherhill Road: timetables will change for most weekday and Saturday services, with buses departing up to 7 minutes earlier from Frankston Station. Passengers will now be able to travel the full route without changing buses at Mount Erin College / Golf Links Road.
  • Route 779 – Frankston – Belvedere via Kananook: late evening services will depart five minutes earlier and weekday morning and early afternoon services will leave two minutes later. The new timetable allows passengers to travel the full route towards Frankston without changing buses and avoids bus congestion at the Belvedere Primary School stop.

View the new timetables for Route 772, Route 775 and Route 779.

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
